word: H7442 - רָנַן - rânan - raw-nan' - Aloud for joy

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - பாடு, சத்தமிடு, கெம்பீரி, கூப்பிடு, ஆர்ப்பரி, மகிழ் களிகூர், முழக்கமிடு, ஆரவாரி, சந்தோஷப்படு, களிகூரப்பண்ணு
2) to cry out, to shout for joy, to give a ringing ery
1) to give a ringing cry (in joy, exaltation, distress)
2) to cry aloud (in summons, exhortation of wisdom)
b) (Piel) to give a ringing cry (in joy, exultation, praise
d) (Hiphil) to cause to ring or to sing out (for joy)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to creak (or emit a stridulous sound), that is, to shout (usually for joy): - aloud for joy, cry out, be joyful, (greatly, make to) rejoice, (cause to) shout (for joy), (cause to) sing (aloud, for joy, out), triumph.
Cognate: H7438, H7440, H7441, H7442, H7443, H7444, H7445, H7446
